html:
4.9.18  1:47 pm   how do you balance being creatively authentic and wanting to be popular/well-liked/survive?

     just try to do both at the same time. looking back through history, that seems like what has worked the best

4.9.18  12:53 pm   WHATS A GOOD HEALTHY SNACK

     lunch

4.9.18  12:16 pm   is your next video going to be a music video or a video with short songs in it but the songs dont take up the entire video

     music video, with 1 song which runs for the entire duration of the video

4.9.18  11:46 am   do you think that fish are actually lamps?

     i think some of them have that feature

4.9.18  11:40 am   Why aren't t?here 8 keys on a keyboard

     they usually have more, to give you more options and possibilities

4.9.18  11:37 am   ?is love a mYth

     yes and no

4.9.18  10:24 am   what are u working on right now?

     a song+video

4.9.18  10:12 am   if you were to write a book, what would you call it?

     that depends what's in it

4.9.18  9:47 am   questions?

     ok

4.9.18  9:36 am   I'm trying to get a band together with some colleagues, but we all have different skillsets and want different things. How do I end up with a band I like and not too many people disappointed? 

     one interesting strategy which may seem off-the-wall at first glance, but in the modern era makes perfect sense for your situation, is to do everything yourself. i know this approach has many many challenges and might even be frowned upon by society, and it might not be the right approach for you, But, boy oh wow let me tell you it solves the above problems u mentioned

4.9.18  9:26 am   What flavor is pi?

     circular?

4.9.18  8:59 am   is?

     some what

     almost all of them

4.9.18  7:14 am   Do you appreciate eggs

     yes

4.9.18  6:40 am   theres too much work to do
its hard to push through and feel motivated

     try writing down what the stuff actually is, and thinking about why you are doing it and also break it down into the actual pieces and steps that go into doing it

4.9.18  5:27 am   do you ever feel positive emotions such as joy

     yes

4.9.18  5:10 am   do some people die from reading your answers

     i hope not

4.9.18  5:04 am   Please try to be reasonable when someone asks you a simple question.

     ok but i already try to do that

     If not then what is this page even for?

     fun and games, which i also think is reasonable

4.9.18  4:28 am   do you enjoy life, in general?

     i can't tell you

4.9.18  4:27 am   Does your new song tell a story

     sort of

4.9.18  4:14 am   WAIT! WHY DID THE MOST RECENT QUESTION TURN FROM "ARE YOU A GOD" TO "ARE YOU A GOOD"?!

     i phoned my good friend nelson mandela, and i had him change it for me

4.9.18  3:21 am   is a b flat or an a sharp cooler

     they sound the same but in writing it depends what other notes are in the key of the moment

4.9.18  2:55 am   how many pianos should i have

     how many do you have now and do you want more and what is the legal limit of pianos in your area, these are the things you will want to look into

4.9.18  12:45 am   is this a bad question?

     it's ok

4.9.18  12:42 am   what funky colors will we encounter in the new music video?

     green, purple, etc

4.9.18  12:27 am   Do you have an upload schedule?

     as soon as humanly possible

4.9.18  12:16 am   do you have any advice about learning how to draw?

     doing it is the best way to learn. there are other ways to learn, maybe someone else can explain things to you, but they are just explaining things that someone learned by actually doing it, and you won't be able to learn it until you actually try doing it. so you have to do it

4.8.18  11:48 pm   what are your hopes and dreams?

     i have them written down some where

4.8.18  11:42 pm   how wierd are you

     i'd say about a 2 point 3

4.8.18  11:23 pm   I want to write more music but depression and anxiety get in the way. Are these even real things or just excuses for not working on stuff?

     maybe

4.8.18  10:07 pm   Do you like to improvise?

     yes

4.8.18  9:18 pm   What is the niftiest piece clothing you have obtained? 

     answering that will change the answer

4.8.18  9:08 pm   What's?

     yes and no

4.8.18  9:05 pm   are you a good?

     sure

4.8.18  8:51 pm   Does your new song tell a story,

     to the same extent that the second verse of la de da tells a story

      or is it more about feelings/emotions? or both, or neither? 

     both

4.8.18  8:39 pm   For you, how much of a song is planned out before going into recording in terms of instrumentation?

     i would love to let you hear the writing demos so you'd know exactly, but they are mumbly as hell and i am not too interested in having them memed all over the internet. but here is a detailed breakdown of the california song, about which details were pre-written and what was not

      I know you've said that you like to know the full, exact structure of how the song will go (how long each part is, how many verses/choruses, etc). But do you typically just kind of have a melody in mind,

     not kind of. exact

     and during the recording process is when you come up with the bassline and drum parts and fills and actual arrangement,

     i use common sense to derive them from the writing, but if there are specific important things they might be in the writing. if you ask me about any specific detail i can probably say yes or no as to whether it was in the writing

      chord voicings,

     the chords are written exactly in the writing

     and all that stuff? Or do you have each part pretty much in your head before going into it?

     it wouldn't be in my head, it would have to be documented. a brand new song that's never existed before cannot be reliably remembered

4.8.18  7:56 pm   How to paint paintings?

     use paint, paint the paint

     up

     build a town

     interesting

     hold on let me run some tests

     pinchy, ouchy

4.8.18  4:23 pm   Should i keep my fictional world as it is or should i throw the whole thought away and start a new dream?

     why can't you save it and start a new one also, in a new file

4.8.18  4:18 pm   Is it wierd that I make music, not so other people can listen, but for me to listen?

     it seems reasonable

4.8.18  4:12 pm   Do you appreciate it when song only say one phrase or word?

     sure, or if it has a lot of words, or a medium amount of words

     yes, but many of the old ones have received updated treatment
